rules.prepare:
cd "$BONDI_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -vfi
export CFLAGS="`echo $CFLAGS | sed 's@-Werror=format-security@@g'`"
cd "$BONDI_BUILD_DIR" "$BONDI_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BONDI_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BONDI_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BONDI_HOST_TYPE" \ --with-packager=Bolt \ --disable-java \ --disable-silent-rules \ --disable-nls \ --disable-gtk-doc-html
cd "$BONDI_SOURCE_DIR" touch doc/libidn*
